idea:
MomsKnowBest is a fast-growing vibrant community of moms, for moms, by moms.
Motherhood is complex fun, fulfilling, grueling, exhausting and very complex. There's no handbook to it. And let's face it – moms are put under just too much pressure.
Fortunately, you don’t have to go through it alone. We're here to help you and be your friend and guide through it all.
At MomsKnowBest you'll find a wide variety of resources spanning from parenting hacks, nutrition for kids, fitness tips, shopping lists, must-haves, tips and tricks for busy moms, support articles and much more.
Everything here is curated and approved by moms, so you know you’re getting all the helpful stuff!
We're here to empower each other, grow together and have some fun along the way. Are you in?
If you would also like to be a part of our journey and feature in our videos do write into us at supermoms@momsknowbest.in
name: TRANQUILITY SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: NASHIB MAJESTEA is a food and beverage company which comes with its unique concept in the sector of food on wheels. The unique design of the vehicle makes it a selfie point attraction for the customers. As it is build on an e-rickshaw its compact, covers less space and is environment friendly. The flavours of tea and coffee are of a variety and made with ayurvedic masale.
name: NASHIB MAJESTEA

idea: M-KASH INDIA FINANCIAL SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED is a Oppo group company which involves in distribution business of financial services i.e. Personal and Business Loan Distribution, Insurance, Mutual Fund, and Credit report. All these services are provided digitally through mobile application as well as through physical modes. We are also in the process of providing Unified Payment Interface (UPI) services. Our Company's vision is to provide a single digital platform for customers to access all the financial services at one platform. It is a single platform for all financial services.
name: M-KASH INDIA FINANCIAL SOLUTIONS PRIVATELIMITED

idea: The firm is engage in providing services of media, marketing, advertising, animation, pre production, content creation, post production, software development, It technology development event management fabrication marketing consultation and branding
name: INK IN CAPS MEDIA AND MARKETING LLP

idea:
In todays market each and every retailer or wholesalers who

sells daily household products/items to their customers, they

have to keep an account of all the products given to each and

every customer on daily basis which is very much time consuming

and with ezeekaro App this is time saving as in the app there is

auto calculation done for the retailers as well as for the

customers to check and keep a track on their Daily products

which they take this maintains a transparency level between

both the consumer and the supplier..
name: ezeekaro
